## Build to learn

- Goals
    - Learn how HF receivers and transmitters really work by building one
    - Build as a group to learn from one another, have fun
    - Practice CW skills on radios we've built ourselves

## Option 1: [BitX kit](http://www.hfsignals.com/)

- [BitX 40](http://www.hfsignals.com/index.php/bitx40/) transceiver
- 40m, 10W SSB, but can be [hacked](http://bitxhacks.blogspot.com/) for CW, more power, etc.
- $59 (shipped)

## Option 3: [Bob Heil Pine Board](https://heilsound.com/amateur-radio-post/the-pine-board-project/)

- 80/40 m, 5 W AM transmitter, for CW omit mic preamp/equalizer
- Tube-based design, featured in January 2018 QST
- [kit $49](https://www.tubesandmore.com/products/pine-board-am-transmitter-kit-ham-nation-bob-heil)
